verses.verse: Paul <WG3972> and Silvanus <WG4610> and Timothy <WG5095> to the church <WG1577> of the Thessalonians <WG2331> in God <WG2316> the Father <WG3962> and the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ: <WG5547> Grace <WG5485> to you and peace. <WG1515>
We give <WG2168> thanks <WG2168> to God <WG2316> always <WG3842> for all <WG3956> of you, making <WG4160> mention <WG3417> [of you] in our prayers; <WG4335>

constantly <WG89> bearing <WG3421> in mind <WG3421> your work <WG2041> of faith <WG4102> and labor <WG2873> of love <WG26> and steadfastness <WG5281> of hope <WG1680> in our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> in the presence <WG1715> of our God <WG2316> and Father, <WG3962>
knowing, <WG3609> brethren <WG80> beloved <WG25> by God, <WG2316> [His] choice <WG1589> of you;

for our gospel <WG2098> did not come <WG1096> to you in word <WG3056> only, <WG3440> but also <WG2532> in power <WG1411> and in the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> and with full <WG4183> conviction; <WG4136> just <WG2531> as you know <WG3609> what <WG3634> kind <WG3634> of men <WG3634> we proved <WG1096> to be among <WG1722> you for your sake. <WG1223>

You also <WG2532> became <WG1096> imitators <WG3402> of us and of the Lord, <WG2962> having received <WG1209> the word <WG3056> in much <WG4183> tribulation <WG2347> with the joy <WG5479> of the Holy <WG40> Spirit, <WG4151>
so <WG5620> that you became <WG1096> an example <WG5179> to all <WG3956> the believers <WG4100> in Macedonia <WG3109> and in Achaia. <WG882>

For the word <WG3056> of the Lord <WG2962> has sounded <WG1837> forth <WG1837> from you, not only <WG3440> in Macedonia <WG3109> and Achaia, <WG882> but also in every <WG3956> place <WG5117> your faith <WG4102> toward <WG4314> God <WG2316> has gone <WG1831> forth, <WG1831> so <WG5620> that we have <WG2192> no <WG3361> need <WG5532> to say <WG2980> anything. <WG5100>

For they themselves <WG846> report <WG518> about <WG4012> us what <WG3697> kind <WG3697> of a reception <WG1529> we had <WG2192> with you, and how <WG4459> you turned <WG1994> to God <WG2316> from idols <WG1497> to serve <WG1398> a living <WG2198> and true <WG228> God, <WG2316>

and to wait <WG362> for His Son <WG5207> from heaven, <WG3772> whom <WG3739> He raised <WG1453> from the dead, <WG3498> [that is] Jesus, <WG2424> who delivers <WG4506> us from the wrath <WG3709> to come. <WG2064>
